translation.from: Allow everyone to view my Webcam
translation.to: 全ての人間にwebカメラの映像を見ることを許可

translation.from: Always allow the following users to view my Webcam
translation.to: 許可した友人だけにwebカメラの映像を見ることを許可

translation.from: Always ask my permission for someone to view my Webcam
translation.to: webカメラの映像を見るにはいつも許可を要求

translation.from: Enter your Yahoo! username and password below and click connect.
translation.to: 下にYahoo! ID とパスワードを入力して接続

translation.from: The webcam server is unavailable. Please try again later.
translation.to: webカメラサーバーが使用できません 時間を置いて再度試してください

translation.from: User does not have a webcam online.
translation.to: このユーザーはwebカメラを使用していません
このユーザーはwebカメラを停止しました

translation.from: When I show my webcam, change my status message to: %prefsYMSGWebcamStatusName%
translation.to: webカメラ映像を公開時、次のステータスに変える %prefsYMSGWebcamStatusName%
Yahoo! メッセンジャー サポート
*** Notice: Connection to relay server was successful. Beginning file transfer.
*** Error: Code %code% received when attempting to verify file transfer.
*** Error: You cannot send files greater than 2GB in size over Yahoo.
*** Notice: We are attempting to connect to relay.msg.yahoo.com and request a file transfer session.
Error when authenticating with the Yahoo! login server: code %errcode%.
You are being logged off Yahoo! Messenger because someone at a computer with IP address "%ip%" has logged in with your account.
Error: Invalid User Account. Make sure you've typed your username correctly and try again.
Error logging into %medium%: Your account has been locked for 12 hours. Please try again later.
Your account has been locked for security reasons. Please re-login to a Yahoo! web property to confirm your password.
%username% wishes to view your webcam. Allow this user access?
